src_original: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayitu-kāmā bhavati catuṣ-karṣa-mūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ |
tgt_original: 「須幾價重衣？ 」答言： 「須千錢價衣！

src_original: pratyavaro vā tad uttariṃ na kṣamati |  atha dāni kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārgha-mūlyaṃ pi dadāti pratigṛhṇāty an-āpattiḥ |
tgt_original: 」諸人便譏訶言： 「我曹官事，雖復費用五倍、六倍，不及此價！ 此輩常說少欲知足，而今無厭！

src_original: tad evaṃ bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇa-baddhaṃ |  kiñcāpi bhikṣur mahārgha-mūlyaṃ pi jānāpayitvā paribhuñjāty anāpattiḥ |
tgt_original: 」諸長老比丘尼聞，種種訶責，乃至今為諸比丘尼結戒，亦如上說。

src_original: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catu[ṣ-ka]rṣa-mūlyāto guru-prāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayen niḥsargika-pācattikaṃ |
tgt_original: 「若比丘尼，乞重衣，應取賤價直四大錢者；
